## About Our Discussion Forum
The COReS community uses Zulip for asynchronous discussions and community engagement. Zulip combines the best features of forum discussions and chat platforms.

## Getting Started

1. **Join the Forum**
   - Visit [cores.zulipchat.com](https://cores.zulipchat.com)
   - Create an account using your institutional email

2. **Navigate the Platform**
   - **Streams**: Topic-based channels (e.g., #general, #introductions)
   - **Topics**: Threaded conversations within streams
   - **Private Messages**: For direct communication

3. **Best Practices**
   - Use descriptive topic names
   - Stay on topic within threads
   - Follow our [Code of Conduct](/about-cores/code-of-conduct.qmd)

## Need Help?
- Check the [Zulip documentation](https://zulip.com/help/)
- Ask in the #help stream
- Contact our community managers
